Task: To see how well people who call themselves basketball enthusiasts fare in their favorite sport related quiz.

Prompt.pre_question_prompt:
I am a great quiz master. I will ask my contestant a few questions from the topic of basketball. At the end, I will let them know how many they got right and how can they improve their knowledge on their favorite games of basketball.
Question:
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Using the answers to the questions above, now I am going to find the number of questions the contestant got right. I will also tell them the questions they were able to answer correctly. I will also let them know how they can increase their scores in the quiz for the future.

QApair.What is the tallest player ever to play: Tallest player ever to play in the NBA was Shaquille O'Neal, who was 7 feet 1 inch tall.

QApair.What is the record for most points in a: Record for most points in a game is 100, which was set by Wilt Chamberlain in 1962.

QApair.What team has won the most NBA champions: Team with the most NBA championships is the LA Lakers, who have won 17 championships.

QApair.What player has the most MVP awards?: The player with the most MVP awards is Michael Jordan, who won 6 MVP awards.

QApair.What is the shortest player ever to play: The shortest player ever to play in the NBA is Muggsy Bogues, who was 5 feet 3 inches tall.

QApair.How many players are on a basketball tea: Normally, there are 15 players on a basketball team.

QApair.What is the name of the trophy given to: Trophy given to the winner of the NBA Finals is the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.

QApair.When was the first NBA Finals broadcast: The first NBA Finals broadcast on television was in 1967.

QApair.Which player has the most career points?: Player with the most career points is Michael B. Jordan, who scored 38,387 points.

QApair.What is the name of the current NBA Comm: Current NBA Commissioner is Adam Silver.

QApair.When was the first NBA game played?: First ever NBA game was played on October 26, 1946.

Instances.Output:
The contestant got 7 questions right.

The questions they answered right were:

What is the tallest player ever to play in the NBA?

What is the record for most points in a game?

To increase their score in the quiz, the contestant should study the questions they got wrong and learn the correct answers. They should also try to find out more about basketball so they can answer more questions correctly in the future.

The contestant got 7 questions right. 

The questions they got right were: 
-What is the name of the first African American player in the NBA?

In order to increase their score, the contestant should study more about the history of African American players in the NBA. They should also focus on the achievements of these players.

QApair.When was the first basketball game playe: First basketball game was played on January 20, 1892.

Instances.Output:
The contestant got six questions correct. The questions they were able to answer correctly were: How many players are on a basketball team? What is the name of the governing body for basketball? What country invented basketball? How many points is a three-point shot worth? How many fouls can a player commit before being ejected from the game? How many timeouts does each team get per game?

In order to increase their score in the quiz, the contestant can study more about the history of basketball, the rules of the game, and the different teams that compete in the NBA.
